comment.shortText: Creates an instance of the headers class.
Creates an instance of the headers class.
A set of key/values to initialize the headers with.

comment.returns: The header value.

comment.shortText: Determines whether or not the indicated header exists in the collection.
comment.returns: True if it exists, false otherwise.

comment.shortText:
XmlHttpRequest's getAllResponseHeaders() method returns a string of response
headers according to the format described here:
http://www.w3.org/TR/XMLHttpRequest/#the-getallresponseheaders-method
This method parses that string into a user-friendly key/value pair object.
comment.returns: A Headers instance containing the parsed headers.
